content: Provide a list of 25 words that end with 'tion'.

Certainly! Here is a list of 25 words that end with "tion":

1. Information
2. Education
3. Communication
4. Celebration
5. Application
6. Population
7. Composition
8. Operation
9. Situation
10. Relation
11. Creation
12. Donation
13. Intervention
14. Invitation
15. Orientation
16. Transportation
17. Reservation
18. Connection
19. Production
20. Distribution
21. Contribution
22. Imagination
23. Exploration
24. Revolution
25. Solution 

I hope this list helps you! If you need more words or have any other questions, feel free to ask.
